name: Prinplup

evolution.description: Prinplup can evolve into Empoleon at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Penguin Pokémon. It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is suffering from a negative status effect or stat change imposed by an opponent, it gains +2 to all attack rolls.
